Text: there is a sub title file, but how do you use it? program unknown.
I only got the chinese subs. How do I get the english ones?

only chinese subs included
spanish subs here:  http://www.solosubtitulos.com/descargar-subtitulos/p19450.html

I downloaded English subtitles here:

http://www.allsubs.org

It is a bit of a hassle following the links, but there are subs in several languages as well.
thanks for the up - keep up the good work doctorqin
As you may have seen: There are 3 subtitle tracks. If you select the 3rd one, english subtitles are shown.

fuck VLC, use Daum PotPlayer. It's the BEST media player out there. 100% FREEWARE. better than Media Player Classic which comes with K-Lite Codec Pack. way way better than VLC :D
Potplayer is the ressurected version of KMplayer.
get the English translated version. supports x64 bit OS  ;)
Many Thanks for the upload and seeders.This is classic Chinese cinema and deserves to be kept alive,

Thank you so much for this upload. I played this file with VLC. As doctorqin mentioned, English subs are embedded. You just select the third subtitle track.
